Posts.Content: I completed my 6th chemo on Friday. I have my scan today to see how much tumour in breast has shrunk. I have not been advised what the next steps will be or how long results of scan will take. I have not had contact with Breast care doctor on nurse since chemo treatment started in Feb. I was thinking of calling them.
Posts.Title: Scan following last chemo

Posts.Content: Does anyone have any advice on when to administer white blood cell injections. I always feel rubbish and wondered if am or pm is better option.
Posts.Title: white blood cell injections

Posts.Content: Hi l finished my chemo on the 25th May. I don't get my scan results until 25th June.Â  I am still suffering with stomach pains and diarrhea after eating. I am trying to get back to healthier eating but fruit veg and wholemeal bread seem irritate my stomach. Some days my stomach sounds like a boiling kettle ! My chemo treatment was FEC-T
Posts.Title: stomach problems
